name: Hara Masala Mutton Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Hara Masala Mutton Recipe: Mutton ½ kg Green chilies 8 whole Whole spices mixed 1 tbsp Ginger garlic 1 tsp heaped Water 4 cups Ingredients for masala Brown onion grinded ½ cups Green chilies 15grinded into a paste Coriander leaves grinded half bunch Ginger garlic 1 tsp Cumin roasted and crushed 1 tsp heaped Coriander 1 tbsp Yogurt 1 cup Salt 1 tsp Oil ½ cup
instructions: Boil mutton with whole spices, ginger garlic and 4 cups of water till nearly tender, keep aside Heat oil in a pan Add grinded hara masala with ginger garlic paste Now add brown onion , yogurt beaten, coriander, cumin, salt 1 tsp fry well add boiled mutton with 1 cup water Leave it on slow fire for 15 minutes.
